content: The settings you are required to use are set by ATT and Yahoo. The standard issue with ATT customers is they appear to be almost universally unaware that they can not use their ATT password with any mail client, Thunderbird included. Customers must use what ATT calls a mailkey instead. See https://www.att.com/support/article/email-support/KM1240308/
creator: MattAuSupport
